title: Le Corbusier Ausblick auf eine Architektur Sans Serif
content:
Hi,

I just can't find out what this is exactly.

Thanks a lot!  
ac

author: ac54

comments.content:
It must be **[Alternate Gothic No 3](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014200922/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Elsner%2BFlake&ffam=AlternateGothicEF%20-%20NoThree&fid=8eca956003aaaace2b77bc7bc814ff72&fsize=60&text=DREI%20MAHNUNGEN%20DER%20BAUKORPER&wrap=2&fit=0)** by Morris Fuller Benton (1903) available from URW++, Bitstream, Linotype, E&F, Tilde ...

-----------------------------------------------  
I found it using Find my Font - [http://www.findmyfont.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014200922/http:/www.findmyfont.com/ "http://www.findmyfont.com")
